title: Manage a Project Risk
description: A project manager identifies a new risk: a potential strike at the port could delay a critical equipment delivery. This risk must be logged and managed.

tasks.description: Create a new entry in the project's risk register.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully logs the new risk.

tasks.description: Assess the risk's probability and impact, and assign it a risk score.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assesses the risk and the system calculates a high risk score.

tasks.description: Develop a mitigation plan, such as identifying an alternative air freight option, and assign an owner to the risk.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent documents a mitigation strategy and assigns responsibility for monitoring the risk.
